1.text: And Benjamin begot Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

2.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

3.text: And Bela had sons: Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,

4.text: and Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

5.text: and Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

6.text: —And these are the sons of Ehud (these were the chief fathers of the inhabitants of Geba; and they carried them away to Manahath;

7.text: even Naaman, and Ahijah, and Gera; he removed them), and he begot Uzza and Ahihud.

8.text: And Shaharaim begot [children] in the land of Moab after he had sent away Hushim and Baara his wives.

9.text: And he begot of Hodesh his wife: Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,

10.text: and Jeuz, and Shobia, and Mirmah; these were his sons, chief fathers.

11.text: And of Hushim he begot Abitub, and Elpaal.

12.text: And the sons of Elpaal: Eber, and Misham, and Shemer, who built Ono, and Lod and its dependent villages;

13.text: and Beriah, and Shema, who were chief fathers of the inhabitants of Ajalon; they drove away the inhabitants of Gath.

15.text: and Zebadiah, and Arad, and Eder,

16.text: and Michael, and Jishpah, and Joha were the sons of Beriah.

17.text: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hiski, and Heber,

18.text: and Jishmerai, and Jizliah, and Jobab were the sons of Elpaal.

19.text: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,

20.text: and Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,

21.text: and Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath were the sons of Shimei.

22.text: And Jishpah, and Eber, and Eliel,

23.text: and Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

24.text: and Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,

25.text: and Jiphdeiah, and Penuel were the sons of Shashak.

26.text: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

27.text: and Jaareshiah, and Elijah, and Zichri were the sons of Jeroham.

28.text: These were the chief fathers, according to their generations, principal men; these dwelt in Jerusalem.

29.text: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; and his wife’s name was Maachah.

30.text: And his son, the firstborn, was Abdon; and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

31.text: and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zecher.

32.text: And Mikloth begot Shimeah. And these also dwelt beside their brethren in Jerusalem, with their brethren.

33.text: And Ner begot Kish; and Kish begot Saul; and Saul begot Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Esh-baal.

34.text: And the son of Jonathan was Merib-Baal; and Merib-Baal begot Micah.

35.text: And the sons of Micah: Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

36.text: And Ahaz begot Jehoaddah; and Jehoaddah begot Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza;

37.text: and Moza begot Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

38.text: And Azel had six sons, and these are their names: Azrikam, Bochru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan; all these were sons of Azel.

39.text: And the sons of Eshek his brother were Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

40.text: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers; and they had many sons, and sons’ sons, a hundred and fifty. All these were of the sons of Benjamin.
